title: Kylie Jenner gets into the Halloween mood early as she bakes ghost themed cupcakes
text:
Kylie Jenner, who runs a $1B makeup and skincare empire called Kylie Cosmetics, is still getting over her shock split from rapper Travis Scott.

But the 22-year-old siren still finds time to do everyday things at home like bake for her little daughter Stormi, aged one, who she had with ex Travis Scott.

On Tuesday evening the Life Of Kylie star shared a photo of a plate of Halloween cupcakes she made in the kitchen of her Hidden Hills, California mansion.

Mommy mode: Kylie Jenner, who runs a $1B makeup and skincare empire called Kylie Cosmetics, is still getting over her shock split from rapper Travis Scott. But the 22-year-old siren still finds time to do everyday things at home like bake for her little daughter Stormi, aged one, who she had with ex Travis Scott

The cupcakes looked like they were professionally made as they were presented on a black tray atop a marble table.

Some had a pumpkin top with orange frosting and black accents.

Others looked like little mummies with white straps and back around the eyes. Then there were the black bat cupcakes.

Sugar rush: The cupcakes looked like they were professionally made as they were presented on a black tray atop a marble table. Some had a pumpkin top with orange frosting and black accents. Others looked like little mummies with white straps and back around the eyes. Then there were the black bat cupcakes

This is not the first time she has celebrated Halloween this year.

Earlier in the week Kylie dressed her dogs in Halloween costumes; she has several greyhounds.

One was dressed as Woody from Toy Story as another had on a Buzz Lightyear outfit. A third was in a pink tutu which may have been the Little Bo-Peep costume.

Woof: This is not the first time she has celebrated Halloween this year. Earlier in the week Kylie dressed her dogs in Halloween costumes; she has several greyhounds

Bark: One was dressed as Woody from Toy Story as another had on a Buzz Lightyear outfit. A third was in a pink tutu

Last year Kylie went to town to dress up for Halloween.

The siren wore a Victoria's Secret outfit complete with wings as she joined sisters Khloe and Kendall, Kourtney and Kim.

And then the CEO dressed up as a butterfly in pink; her daughter Stormi had a matching outfit.

Angel time: Last year Kylie went to town to dress up for Halloween. The siren wore a Victoria's Secret outfit complete with wings as she joined sisters Khloe and Kendall, Kourtney and Kim

She loves her wings: And then the CEO dressed up as a butterfly in pink
description: Kylie Jenner, who runs a $1B makeup and skincare empire called Kylie Cosmetics, is still getting over her shock split from rapper Travis Scott.
